entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.3°C
Wind: N 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 8 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
